title: India says it has contained Nipah virus outbreak
desc: Indian authorities have contained a Nipah virus outbreak after confirming two cases in eastern West Bengal state.

title: AI that talks to itself learns faster and smarter
desc: AI may learn better when it’s allowed to talk to itself. Researchers showed that internal “mumbling,” combined with short-term memory, helps AI adapt to new tasks, switch goals, and handle complex challenges more easily. This approach boosts learning efficiency while using far less training data. It could pave the way for more flexible, human-like AI systems.

title: Ringgit stages comeback, among Asia’s best performers, says World Bank economist
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: The ringgit has staged a strong comeback, rising from around the 4.70 level against the US dollar a few years ago to the 3.90 level currently, making it one of Asia's best-performing currencies, said World Bank lead economist for Malaysia Apurva Sanghi.

title: Chinese ambassador announces joint taskforce in hunt for man who threw hot coffee over Brisbane baby
desc: China's ambassador to Australia says authorities will travel to Brisbane as the search for the man who threw hot coffee on a baby continues.

title: SPAR Slovenia supports customers in making healthier everyday choices
desc: To help customers make healthier choices, SPAR Slovenia has introduced the “Experts Recommend” label.
